CustomField.description: Comma-separated list of sample record IDs for multi-sample analysis (V2.0 feature). Supports 1-5 record IDs to enable richer data pattern detection across multiple records.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Optional: Provide 1-5 record IDs (comma-separated) for multi-sample analysis. Example: 006ABC123,006DEF456,006GHI789
CustomField.label: Sample Record IDs
